snippet: LEAD: Funds to help earthquake victims in California have been set up by the following organizations:  American Red Cross Disaster Relief Fund, P.O. Box 4691, Grand Central Station, New York, N.Y. 10163. Telephone: 800-453-9000.  Episcopal Church/...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Funds to help earthquake victims in California have been set up by the following organizations: American Red Cross Disaster Relief Fund, P.O. Box 4691, Grand Central Station, New York, N.Y. 10163. Telephone: 800-453-9000. Episcopal Church/The Presiding Bishop's Fund for World Relief, The Episcopal Church Center, 815 Second Avenue, New York, N.Y.
